summary: Diff updates product data and card behavior to support Chess.com 1 Year duration, BDT pricing, remote logo with local fallback, and updates Netflix/Spotify/YouTube logo paths. It also adjusts cart and WhatsApp checkout messaging. No clearly required items are definitively missing based on the provided truncated diffs, but a few changes appear unrelated to the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced next-themes ThemeProvider wrapper in the main App component.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not ask to add or change theme management libraries; requirement focus was product config/logo updates and product-card interactions.

hallucinated_features.description: Cart totals use the first cart item's currencyLabel as the total currency label (defaulting to 'Tk').
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only specifies BDT labeling behavior for Chess.com totals; this new cross-cart currency heuristic is not requested and could be considered extra behavior.
